sentences.en: As dusk falls on Shanghai's futuristic skyline, spotlights blaze on its newest and tallest landmark.
sentences.cn: 当夕阳从大上海那超现实主义的地平线落下, 聚光灯开始照耀这个城市最高,以及最新的地标.

sentences.en: Gaines is not referring to the futuristic exterior.
sentences.cn: Gaines并不是在说它超前的外表.

sentences.en: The designers of the television studio had tried hard to be futuristic.
sentences.cn: 电视转播室的设计者们很努力的使其更具现代化.

sentences.en: The futuristic sports stadium is the pride of the city.
sentences.cn: 这座超现代的体育场是该市的骄傲。

words.tran_cn: 未来主义者；未来派画家

trans.tran_cn: 未来的，未来派的，未来主义的
trans.tran_en: something which is futuristic looks unusual and modern, as if it belongs in the future instead of the present
